message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
Considering inflation, this is a more fair offer. Accept and let's end the game!
Bob, let's be reasonable. This offer still benefits you greatly considering the inflation.  Every round is costing us both money!
Inflation is taking its toll, let's split it more evenly to minimize losses. This is my most generous offer yet!
